conclusion: Analyze the image to determine the trajectory of car A and identify collision blocks.
The image shows a green surface with blocks of different colors and a toy car labeled 'A' in the lower left corner.
Car A is positioned in the lower left corner, indicating it is moving towards the right side of the image.
The car will first encounter the blocks in its path, with the closest blocks being the yellow and blue ones.
The car's power and direction suggest it will collide with the yellow block first due to proximity and alignment.
Upon collision with the yellow block, the car's trajectory will be deflected towards the blue block.
After colliding with the blue block, the car's motion will cease due to impact and deflection effects.
The car labeled 'A' will collide with the yellow block and then the blue block, finally stopping after hitting the blue block.
